explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of Machine Learning models for loan repayment prediction.
explanations.supervised learning: The study involves predicting loan repayment, which is a supervised learning task as it uses labeled data.
explanations.classification: The task of predicting loan repayment is a classification problem, where the outcome is binary (repay or not repay).
explanations.support vector machine: The paper mentions using Logistic Regression with Support Vector Machine (SVM) as one of the ensemble methods.
explanations.SVM: SVM is mentioned as one of the machine learning models used in the ensemble learning approach.
explanations.decision tree: The paper mentions using Logistic Regression with Decision Tree as one of the ensemble methods.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions using Logistic Regression with Artificial Neural Network as one of the ensemble methods.
explanations.deep learning: The use of Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) indicates the application of deep learning techniques.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper mentions using Logistic Regression with Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) as one of the ensemble methods.
explanations.LSTM: LSTM is mentioned as one of the machine learning models used in the ensemble learning approach.
